Description: Fragment of undyed, plain weave linen cloth with tapestry (grouped warps and some soumak outlining) decoration; Fragmentary remains of a roundel (c.29x29cm), central geometric motifs with stylised traceries/interlacing, with a border of a freize of purple circular motifs and intervening purple dots on a beige background; Remains of two tapestry bands (c.3cm wide, each) of stylised floral and vegetal motifs and geometric motifs in purple wool and linen; Warp: S spun linen, c.16tpc; Weft: S spun linen, Z spun wool, c.11tpc in plain areas and c.50-55tpc in tapestry, soumak in S spun linen; Edges: all ragged.
Curator's comments: Unreg 29; Found 1988? in packet in packet in Keeper's Office; Previous location cupboard O; From a large cloth, purpose unnown; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (12.2.1991).
